comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of bowls of goat curry
- y: number of bowls of chicken curry

Definitions:
- x: number of bowls of goat curry to be made
- y: number of bowls of chicken curry to be made

Extracted Constraints:
- 3x + 5y \leq 1500: Goat meat constraint (available goat meat)
- 6x + 5y \leq 2000: Chicken meat constraint (available chicken meat)
- y \geq 0.25(x+y): At least 25% of bowls made must be chicken curry
- x \geq y: Number of goat curry bowls must be larger than chicken curry bowls
- x, y \geq 0: Non-negativity constraint

Objective:
- Minimize 6x + 5y: Total amount of curry base used
